tool_description: Obtain company data from Japanese companies (KYB)
name: Japan company data
title: Japan company data

api_list.name: Get Company Patents
api_list.description: This API endpoint allows you to determine which patents have been filed by a Japanese company via their corporate ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/hojin/v1/hojin/4030001044808/patent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/hojin/v1/hojin/{corporateid}/patent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for a Japanese company by name, such as "間宮"

api_list.name: Search By Corporate ID
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search by Corporate ID, i.e. 4030001044808
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/hojin/v1/hojin/4030001044808"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/hojin/v1/hojin/{corporateid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japan-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
